name: Simurg

trait.name: Flyby
text: The simurg doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Keen Sight
text: The simurg has advantage on Perception (Wisdom) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The simurg's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect poison and disease, detect thoughts, spare the dying
2/day each: cure wounds, lesser restoration, purify food and drink

action.name: Multiattack
text: The simurg makes three attacks. one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Forceful Gale (Recharge 5-6)
text: The simurg beats its wings, creating wind in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 27 (6d8) bludgeoning damage, is pushed 10 feet away from the simurg and is knocked prone. On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn't pushed or knocked prone.

spells: detect poison and disease, detect thoughts, spare the dying, cure wounds, lesser restoration, purify food and drink, greater restoration, remove curse
